title: blue Snow
author: blue Snow
content: we're headed to the semifinals.but still, 1 match left in the quarter-final between Juventus and Lazio.And, the club who have reached the semifinals is Inter, Cremonese, and Fiorentina, Cremonese will face Fiorentina, while Inter still waiting for the winner Juventus and Lazio.The odds between Juventus and Lazio are 2.08 and 3.60. The draw chance is 3.30. Juventus is still the favorite, they will play at home and try to build the last reputation in Italy.I don't gamble too much, I have bet on Juventus.

comments.author: macson
comments.body: Roma really performed badly, their defense was still very chaotic, Cremonese got 2 lucky goals for them (1 goal was a penalty and 1 more goal was an own goal), even though the pressure given by Roma was enormous but it was useless, all of them were thwarted by the Cremonese goalkeeper.juvenstus vs lazio will exciting, even though on paper the chance for juventus to win is quite big (they are the hosts) but without good anticipation and strategy, Lazio can beat Juventus easily.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Sounds like the favorite to win the cup from the teams listed here is Inter.I doubt Fiorentina or Cremonese will be a big problem for them.In the clash between the two I see an easy win for Fiorentina as in Italy as we are seeing which teams are in the final stages of the cup it looks like it has always been the case that every team values a lot the cup and as such only big teams excluding Cremonese are in the final stages.I say Inter the most favored because they have won easily in the Super cup against Milan and also the only team to have beaten Napoli during recent times.Juventus and Lazio are strong ones but I think Inter has the upper hand in the cup.

comments.author: Oluwa-btc
comments.body: Quote from: macson on February 02, 2023, 11:22:24 AMRoma really performed badly, their defense was still very chaotic, Cremonese got 2 lucky goals for them (1 goal was a penalty and 1 more goal was an own goal), even though the pressure given by Roma was enormous but it was useless, all of them were thwarted by the Cremonese goalkeeper.juvenstus vs lazio will exciting, even though on paper the chance for juventus to win is quite big (they are the hosts) but without good anticipation and strategy, Lazio can beat Juventus easily.Disappointed with the results, didn't view the game not even bothered to see the highlights of the game likewise.It's back to back loss, one during the league game against Napoli, I felt like this would be a turnaround for Roma to have a win during the cup games.Even at Manchester United, Jose Mourinho and his squad is always fund of low chances created during the first half and fighting back during the second half which is not a good way to approach game's.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: blue Snow on February 02, 2023, 07:42:33 AM....The odds between Juventus and Lazio are 2.08 and 3.60. The draw chance is 3.30. Juventus is still the favorite, they will play at home and try to build the last reputation in Italy.I don't gamble too much, I have bet on Juventus.Is Juventus in top form recently? I haven't followed Serie A for a while but a quick look on the table suggest that Lazio is the better team. Their performance in recent games also supports that. I must be missing something here. is there any major injuries to Lazio's key players that we're not aware of?

comments.author: Bobrox
comments.body: Left one opportunity getting tittle in this season for Juventus is Coppa Italia season 2022/2023 after their chance in domestic league almost close with 15 points deduction with fake information about player transfer values. Lazio opponent seems little difficult for Juventus actually after points deduction have inconsistency performance and last match defeated by AC Monza as home match. Juventus have back to the top performance actually have 8 matches winning in a row but after points deduction punishment Juventus face inconsistent performance and Coppa Italia become alternative tittle in this season.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Quote from: Yogee on February 02, 2023, 01:43:08 PMQuote from: blue Snow on February 02, 2023, 07:42:33 AM....The odds between Juventus and Lazio are 2.08 and 3.60. The draw chance is 3.30. Juventus is still the favorite, they will play at home and try to build the last reputation in Italy.I don't gamble too much, I have bet on Juventus.Is Juventus in top form recently? I haven't followed Serie A for a while but a quick look on the table suggest that Lazio is the better team. Their performance in recent games also supports that. I must be missing something here. is there any major injuries to Lazio's key players that we're not aware of?In the last 3 matches in Serie A Juventus performed poorly after they received a point deduction from the FIGC so they are at the bottom of the middle table at the start they were in the top 4 so they dropped a little (maybe) from their performance.So far Lazio is pretty good they have been able to beat Milan before with a big score but I think in the Coppa Italia it will be different but on the other hand, Juventus still have a lot of superior playing at home, but to be honest I am more inclined towards Lazio who will win this game.It seems that Lazio's key players are not injured.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Quote from: $crypto$ on February 02, 2023, 02:20:10 PMQuote from: Yogee on February 02, 2023, 01:43:08 PM....Is Juventus in top form recently? I haven't followed Serie A for a while but a quick look on the table suggest that Lazio is the better team. Their performance in recent games also supports that. I must be missing something here. is there any major injuries to Lazio's key players that we're not aware of?In the last 3 matches in Serie A Juventus performed poorly after they received a point deduction from the FIGC so they are at the bottom of the middle table at the start they were in the top 4 so they dropped a little (maybe) from their performance.I see. I'm not gonna dig deeper into the penalty handed out to them but that somehow explains why the odds are still in favor of Juve.QuoteSo far Lazio is pretty good they have been able to beat Milan before with a big score but I think in the Coppa Italia it will be different but on the other hand, Juventus still have a lot of superior playing at home, but to be honest I am more inclined towards Lazio who will win this game.It seems that Lazio's key players are not injured.Odds @3.60 is not a bad deal actually. The result of recent matches matters in this case so I'll be taking Lazio as well. Who knows if the Juve players still haven't found their inspiration and confidence to play at a high level?

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: blue Snow on February 02, 2023, 07:42:33 AMI don't gamble too much, I have bet on Juventus.I judge you to bet on Juventus in a professional manner and stick to your stance, that's great, we know Juventus are currently being hit with a score reduction case, it seems that this case has no effect on the team and players, it can be proven that Juventus have made it to a quarterfinals.What is certain is that in the Coppa Italia league this time cannot be underestimated for the Lazio team, they have also proven their success so far.Remembering their meeting Juventus vs. Lazio in Serie A, one game that ended in a 'draw' overall I believe that even though there are a few problems at the moment, they must remain professional.I also took part in the bet between Juventus vs. Lazio.I'm sure that in 2023 Juventus will be able to reach the semifinals and beat Lazio.

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: Quote from: YOSHIE on February 02, 2023, 03:37:28 PMQuote from: blue Snow on February 02, 2023, 07:42:33 AMI don't gamble too much, I have bet on Juventus.I judge you to bet on Juventus in a professional manner and stick to your stance, that's great, we know Juventus are currently being hit with a score reduction case, it seems that this case has no effect on the team and players, it can be proven that Juventus have made it to a quarterfinals.The point reduction has affected them already, they lost against Monza in their last match and also with rumor that some players will be leaving if Juventus failed to finish in the CL zone. The fact that they were really bad in their last 3 Serie-A matches by gaining 1 point only also shows that they are not in a good condition. It will not be an easy game for Juventus, they need to play with their best (players, strategy and mental) if they want to beat Lazio as Lazio is in a better form than Juventus.

comments.author: ILuckyGuyI
comments.body: First of all, it was a very bad defensive performance by Roma there. Cremonese were so comfortable in their defense line. Both of their goals were due to defensive mistakes. On the first one Kumbulla made a huge mistake and led that attack to end up with a penalty. Cremonese scored the penalty but I must admit that it was one of the funniest penalties given.    Patricio kept himself away from the player in the last moment and Dessers just faked his fall. The second goal was a really unlucky one for Roma though. Belotti gave hope by scoring in the last moments but there wasn't much time left for an equalizer.For Juventus - Lazio, I have mixed feelings. Juventus players seem preoccupied after the bad incident they have had recently. The Monza loss is a proof for that. Maybe Juventus would like to focus on the Coppa Italia after being in a terrible condition in the Serie A. But still I can't trust them. I'll try my luck with Lazio win in this as I see their effort more promising.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Quote from: YOSHIE on February 02, 2023, 03:37:28 PMI also took part in the bet between Juventus vs. Lazio.I'm sure that in 2023 Juventus will be able to reach the semifinals and beat Lazio.You bit too late to bet on Juventus, I see the odds changed to 1.27. If you follow me after this thread, Maybe you will get it the same as me 2x, be $100 atm. Quote from: ILuckyGuyI on February 02, 2023, 04:51:28 PMFor Juventus - Lazio, I have mixed feelings. Juventus players seem preoccupied after the bad incident they have had recently. The Monza loss is a proof for that. Maybe Juventus would like to focus on the Coppa Italia after being in a terrible condition in the Serie A. But still I can't trust them. I'll try my luck with Lazio win in this as I see their effort more promising.Seem you don't have luck, Juventus look efficient and effective even having 43% ball possession. Lazio can't place a player that should be

comments.author: Distraction
comments.body: The second half was really difficult for Juventus but they still managed to secure a 1-0 win somehow. Because they changed roles in this half. Juventus started to be more ineffective and Lazio captured the control of the match suddenly. I understand Juventus that they just wanted to keep this score. Otherwise they would have played near their first half effort. Lazio did their best but it wasn't enough. I should admit I wasn't expecting Juventus to defeat them in 90 minutes.Juventus want this title as they are going to have a horrible season in the Serie A. I don't know if they can go until the title while there is a big Inter threat especially.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: The quarter-final has been over, now we are going to the next semi-final, here is the schedule;Juventus vs Inter, and Cremonese vs Fiorentina;Until today, the odd between Juventus vs Inter is ; 2.80 vs 2.55, draw 3.20while Cremonese vs Fiorentina; 3.45 vs 2.14, draw 3.30with that odds we can see who the favorite winner. maybe a bit hard to choose Juventus and Inter, because having the same power and have tradition win on Coppa. while another match, as we can Fiorentina is abit favorite because the opponent is not stable on seri A.

comments.author: Juggy777
comments.body: Quote from: blue Snow on February 05, 2023, 05:01:33 AMThe quarter-final has been over, now we are going to the next semi-final, here is the schedule;Juventus vs Inter, and Cremonese vs Fiorentina;Until today, the odd between Juventus vs Inter is ; 2.80 vs 2.55, draw 3.20while Cremonese vs Fiorentina; 3.45 vs 2.14, draw 3.30with that odds we can see who the favorite winner. maybe a bit hard to choose Juventus and Inter, because having the same power and have tradition win on Coppa. while another match, as we can Fiorentina is abit favorite because the opponent is not stable on seri A.@blue Snow in my personal opinion Inter Milan will win against Juventus, because they’re in good form and given the current situation of Juventus it’s obvious that Inter Milan will be the favourites. Furthermore despite the odds I would yet suggest all to pick Inter only, but if someone wants to take a risk then wagering on Juventus is definitely an option but I won’t recommend it as I don’t believe that they’ll win against Inter Milan.

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Quote from: Juggy777 on February 05, 2023, 11:03:07 AM@blue Snow in my personal opinion Inter Milan will win against Juventus, because they’re in good form and given the current situation of Juventus it’s obvious that Inter Milan will be the favourites. Furthermore despite the odds I would yet suggest all to pick Inter only, but if someone wants to take a risk then wagering on Juventus is definitely an option but I won’t recommend it as I don’t believe that they’ll win against Inter Milan.I agree, besides that, we must be careful when betting on Inter,  because Juventus is playing at home. the odds also balance for every consideration. I just look Juventus has 2.80, Inter 2.55, and the chance of drawing is 3.20. In this situation, maybe we have to wait a month to just look the squad (if have injury or anything change)

comments.author: Lillominato89
comments.body: considering the current physical form of Juventus and Inter, today I would bet on Inter to win without a doubt, but there is still more than a month to wait before we get to the first match of the semi-finals, physical form and injuries will have to be reconsidered. let's not forget that for juventus, winning the cup would guarantee them a place in the europa league, which currently does not have the certainty of playing it. given the large odds, one might think of using an exchenge betting to scalp one of the two odds

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Quote from: Lillominato89 on February 08, 2023, 01:40:37 AMconsidering the current physical form of Juventus and Inter, today I would bet on Inter to win without a doubt, but there is still more than a month to wait before we get to the first match of the semi-finals, physical form and injuries will have to be reconsidered. let's not forget that for juventus, winning the cup would guarantee them a place in the europa league, which currently does not have the certainty of playing it. given the large odds, one might think of using an exchenge betting to scalp one of the two oddsNothing to expect except besides the coppa cup, because in Seri A Juventus is doesn't hope to be on top stand. Beside that, the only 1 hope to get back they name is the coppa cup, because on the Europa league, Juventus also still don't hope, The competition there is also tough than Seri A. so, I thing, next month, Juventus will not give up Inter to beat them, they will guard to not injury what ever is way.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Cremonese is the weakest team from the other teams that will compete in the semifinals but they cannot be underestimated because they can get rid of Napoli and Roma, a performance that is worth considering and beware for as the next opponent, it is surprising to see that Cremonese can have a different result in the league.

comments.author: Lillominato89
comments.body: Quote from: blue Snow on February 09, 2023, 03:57:33 AMQuote from: Lillominato89 on February 08, 2023, 01:40:37 AMconsidering the current physical form of Juventus and Inter, today I would bet on Inter to win without a doubt, but there is still more than a month to wait before we get to the first match of the semi-finals, physical form and injuries will have to be reconsidered. let's not forget that for juventus, winning the cup would guarantee them a place in the europa league, which currently does not have the certainty of playing it. given the large odds, one might think of using an exchenge betting to scalp one of the two oddsNothing to expect except besides the coppa cup, because in Seri A Juventus is doesn't hope to be on top stand. Beside that, the only 1 hope to get back they name is the coppa cup, because on the Europa league, Juventus also still don't hope, The competition there is also tough than Seri A. so, I thing, next month, Juventus will not give up Inter to beat them, they will guard to not injury what ever is way.That's what I think too, in Serie A Juventus now have very little hope of being able to reach a place that gives them the certainty of playing in Europe, perhaps they could compete for the Conference League, but for them it would be a cause for shame given the notoriety they have in Italy, winning the Coppa Italia instead would guarantee them a place in a more prestigious competition. But we have to consider that they still have to beat Inter which isn't exactly easy
